ModMetaData.name: SS No Rogue Robots - Fix for Raiderpedes and other battle mech/mech faction mods
ModMetaData.author: Spdskatr
ModMetaData.description: Fixes up the spawning of non-mechanoid factions with mechanoid flesh types in ancient dangers and mechanoid ship parts.\nPreview image: Raiderpede, Drawn by A Friend, in Jdalt's Raiderpede mod.
